General.Name: Shping Coin
General.Description: Shping platform is an innovative self-service shopper marketing system based on the Ethereum blockchain. The platform will allow shoppers to scan products bar codes and access to the product information, check for authenticity, product recall status, and product reviews contributed by other Shping users. Furthermore, the Shping platform enables brands and retailers to channel their marketing budgets into rewarding the consumer directly for their attention and engagement.

ICO.Description:
Shping platform is an innovative self-service shopper marketing system based on the Ethereum blockchain. The platform will allow shoppers to scan products bar codes and access to the product information, check for authenticity, product recall status, and product reviews contributed by other Shping users. Furthermore, the Shping platform enables brands and retailers to channel their marketing budgets into rewarding the consumer directly for their attention and engagement.

Team:

  • Gennady Volchek: CEO & Founder.
  • Andrei Kucherov: Chief Technology Officer. 
  • Tony Lee: Chief Marketing Officer.
  • Maria McInally: Customer Service/ Account Manager. 
  • Nurul Huda Ab Hamid: ASEAN Corporate Sales Manager. 
  • Sasha Xie: Business Development Manager, China. 

Shping will be holding its ICO on the 22nd of February, 2018. The ICO token supply represents 50% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 5,000,000,000 tokens available, for 0.01 USD each during the offering. The ICO is planned to end on the 23rd of March, 2018.

Token Reserve Split (50%):

  • 2% Shping Team;
  • 5% Advisers;
  • 1% Bounties;
  • 42% Shping App Incentive Reserve;

Shping ICO will feature a bonus program and a bounty campaign, and the token will not be mineable.
